data.name: Paradise Puzzle!
data.detailed_description:
Paradise Puzzle! is casual puzzle game.
Call a girl you want to play with , and beat monsters.
Beautiful, kawaii, a little erotic CG will be yours!



Your goal is to line up three or more of the same type of gem horizontally or vertically.
Feel free to move them to any square you'd like!
When you clear a line of gems, the spots you cleared will be filled with prisms falling from above. Because of this, you can combo matches together.
However, once you stop dragging it, or if the time limit reaches zero, your turn is over.

In order to win, you have to fight until the enemy's HP goes down to zero.
if your HP goes down to zero first, you lose.
The hourglass shows the number of turns you have left.
You'll also lose if that reaches zero.

You can make use of any type of jem to damage the enemy, but there are also jems that have special effects.
If you clear Skull jem, your turn counter will go down.
If you clear Potion jem, your HP will be restored.

I recommend you carefully look at the jems on screen and consider which ones will give you the highest combo when you clear them.
Good Luck!



・Kumiko Tsukisiro
　164cm / B105/ W56 / H86


and more characters will be add in future!



・Easy design to play
・Various type of heroines(more characters will be add in future)
・8 stages for each girl!
・8 CGs for each girl too!
・9 achievements (to be added later!)

*Note
The user interface is not fully language-enabled.
Please be aware of this.

data.short_description: Move the gems in the stage and line up three or more to make them disappear! If you line up 3 or more gems, you can reduce the HP of the enemy. You will win the battle when you reduce the enemy's HP to 0.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace.
Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

This game contains the following content
Sex without consent
Extreme play
